name: obsidian-ai-transcriber
description: Local speech-to-text transcription for Obsidian using Whisper.cpp

scripts.build:release: npm run check && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const manifest=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./manifest.json','utf8'));const dir='build/'+manifest.version;['manifest.json','styles.css'].forEach(f=>fs.existsSync(f)&&fs.copyFileSync(f,path.join(dir,f)));const wasmSrc='node_modules/@echogarden/fvad-wasm/fvad.wasm';if(fs.existsSync(wasmSrc)){fs.copyFileSync(wasmSrc,path.join(dir,'fvad.wasm'));console.log('Copied fvad.wasm');}console.log('Release files created in',dir)"
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run build

author: Musashino Software
